resources.string:
To start logging: 

1. Turn on bluetooth 

 2. Turn on the temperature sensor 

3. Hold sensor next to phone and tap Start 

 All prior data on the sensor will be deleted

GPS tracking started. 

Waiting for first reading. 

If more than 1 minute passes before the first reading, turn on cellular data to help the location service.
Other apps can be used while logging\n\nTo stop or cancel, press the button for 3 seconds
Logging resumed. Waiting for next GPS reading

1. Make sure bluetooth is on.

 Hold sensor next to phone and tap Download 

 3. Turn off sensor after the download is complete 

 To resume logging, tap Cancel
The sensor will be cleared after the data is downloaded. \n\n Do you wish to continue?
All data will be deleted from the sensor. \n Do you wish to continue?
All functions are disabled while logging is on. \n\n Stop logging before running any other commands.
Unable to send command to sensor
No sensors were found. \n\nMake sure the sensor and bluetooth are on and tap again
More than one sensor was found. \n\n Move away from the other sensors and tap again
